swap(uint256,address,address,bytes).details: Decode the passed in data and re-encode it with the correct amountIn. This is because the amountIn is not known until the funds are transferred to this contract.

params._fromAsset: Address of the token to swap from.
params._swapData: Data to pass to the PancakeV3 router.
params._toAsset: Address of the token to swap to.

swapETH(uint256,address,bytes).details: Decode the passed in data and re-encode it with the correct amountIn. This is because the amountIn is not known until the funds are transferred to this contract.

params._swapData: Data to pass to the PancakeV3 router.
params._toAsset: Address of the token to swap to.

swap(uint256,address,address,bytes).notice: Swap the given amount of tokens using PancakeSwapV3.

swapETH(uint256,address,bytes).notice: Swap the given amount of ETH using PancakeSwapV3.
